description: Structured information on a digital identifier schema.

IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) of this digital identifier schema.
IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
IRI.title: IRI

identifierPattern._instruction: Enter the required pattern (regular expression; ECMA 262 dialect) for the identifiers of this digital identifier schema.
identifierPattern.description: Format of a term or code used to identify something or someone.
identifierPattern.title: Identifier pattern

type._instruction: Enter the type of this digital identifier schema.
type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
type.title: Type

title: Digital identifier schema
